text: I have to do it todayThe only thing I ever wanted was to matter to someone  I pursued crazy dreams just with the hope that someone would appreciate what I was doing  like producing music  writing poetry and aspiring to write books  Here I am as a   year old music major in college  In the end  people only liked what I was doing and not me   I don t have any family  I never knew my father  All I know is that he was a prolific drug dealer  I lost the single mother that raised me and my brother to suicide  I ve been independent for a year now and no matter what I do  nobody accepts me for the person I truly am  I d sell my soul just to feel love if only for a minute  I finally met someone I really liked  and it turns out she was talking to me as a joke  because apparently I m so horridly ugly and bland  I tried so hard not to be  I worked out consistently  stayed well groomed  and always dressed the best I knew how to  None of that matters now I guess   I have the belt around my neck now and am just trying to work up the courage to end it  I m so scared  but I don t see any alternative for me  I m worthless now  and I can t imagine a world where I matter to anyone  even if I continued living  I lived and will die a failure
summary: As a year old music major in college, I wanted to be accepted for who I am. I don't have any family, I never knew my father, I lost my single mother to suicide and I was raised by a drug dealer. I met someone I really liked, but it turned out she was talking to him as a joke. Now I have the belt around my neck and I'm going to kill myself.
